title: U.S. News: Disney's PR Chief Exits Amid Dust-Up
text:
As the leader of corporate affairs, Mr. Morrell oversaw corporate communications, global public policy and government relations.

In a message to his staff, Mr. Morrell wrote, "After three months in this new role, it has become clear to me that for a number of reasons it is not the right fit." He wished Disney and Mr. Chapek "the very best."

Mr. Chapek in an email Friday to Disney executives wrote that Mr. Morrell was leaving to pursue other opportunities.

Mr. Morrell joined Disney after an 11-year stint in communications and external affairs at U.K. energy giant BP PLC.

Mr. Chapek said communications efforts will fall under Kristina Schake, who was named executive vice president of global communications earlier in April.
